Detailed Description

Simple wrapper class for a fast mutex.

Member Function Documentation

void lubyk::Mutex::lock ( ) [inline]

If the mutex is locked by another thread, waits until it is unlocked, lock and continue. If the mutex is not locked. Lock and continue. If this thread locked it: bang!

void lubyk::Mutex::unlock ( ) [inline]

Release the lock so others can work on the data.
